ai-robot-brain/index.title: Module 3: The AI Robot Brain
ai-robot-brain/index.description: Perception and Navigation with NVIDIA Isaac

appendices/cloud-setup.title: Cloud Setup Guide
appendices/cloud-setup.description: This guide provides instructions for setting up cloud-based development environments to run the tutorials and projects in this book. This is an alternative if you do not have access to the recommended local hardware.

appendices/hardware-guide.title: Hardware Guide
appendices/hardware-guide.description: This section provides recommendations for hardware components necessary to follow the tutorials and build the projects in this book.

appendices/resources.title: Additional Resources
appendices/resources.description: This section provides a curated list of external resources to deepen your understanding and explore advanced topics related to Physical AI and humanoid robotics.

appendices/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Guide
appendices/troubleshooting.description: This guide provides solutions to common issues encountered while setting up the development environment, running simulations, or implementing the code examples in this book.

digital-twin/index.title: Module 2: The Digital Twin
digital-twin/index.description: Bringing Robots to Life in Simulation

glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.description: This glossary provides definitions for key terms used throughout the "Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics" book.

instructor-guide.title: Instructor Guide: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
instructor-guide.description: This guide provides instructors with resources, teaching notes, and assessment rubrics to effectively deliver the "Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics: From Simulation to Reality" course.

intro.title: Welcome to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics: From Simulation to Reality

student-resources/ros2_python_cheat_shee.title: ROS 2 Python Cheat Sheet
student-resources/ros2_python_cheat_shee.description: This cheat sheet provides a quick reference for common ROS 2 commands and Python code snippets.

student-resources/vla_reference_card.title: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) Reference Card
student-resources/vla_reference_card.description: This card provides a quick overview of the Vision-Language-Action (VLA) pipeline and key components for humanoid robotics.

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.

video_embedding_instructions.title: Video Embedding Instructions
video_embedding_instructions.description: This document provides instructions on how to embed video demonstrations into the Docusaurus documentation. This task is to be completed after the video demonstrations have been recorded and edited (Task T085) and are available in the static/videos/ directory.
